item.title: Topology of irregular isomonodromy times on a fixed pointed curve
item.description: arXiv:2208.02575v3 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We will define and study (moduli) spaces of deformations of irregular classes on Riemann surfaces, which provide an intrinsic viewpoint on the `times' of irregular isomonodromy systems in general. Our aim is to study the deeper generalisation of the G-braid groups that occur as fundamental groups of such deformation spaces, with particular focus on the generalisation of the full G-braid groups.
item.dc:creator: Jean Dou\c{c}ot, Gabriele Rembado
